div.pre: 2320 Granada environs, La Vega de Gra- nada dist., 1944 Burial: 4th-3rd cent. B.C. ? (Jenkins) Contents: AR Alexander III Disposition: unknown Mateu y Llopis, Ampurias 1945-6, p. 254, no. CXIII (no details; information from M. Go- mez-Moreno)
